content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I received a list of files in the current directory from the computer, which includes "new_file.txt". I executed a Python file called "average.py" and received the message "The average of the numbers is: 3.0". I also read a file called "productive_things_to_do.txt" and learned about over 100 productive things to do when bored, rest and relaxation, and a free time tracking software called Clockify. I wrote to "new_file.txt" but received an error message saying the file has already been updated. I tried to replace "This is a new log entry." in "file_logger.txt" with "This is a modified log entry." but received a message saying no matches were found.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "delete_file", "args": {"filename": "new_file.txt"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command delete_file returned: File deleted successfully.', type='action_result')]
"""
